1.name: Iñaki Villar
1.title: Android Engineer
1.shortBio: I started working in Android 5 years ago, I felt in love with the platform and the community...
1.bio:
I started wokring in Android 5 years ago, I felt in love with the platform and the community.
Since then I have been working with banking, airline, and storage apps in Spain and Ireland.
Recently I moved to Bangkok to join Agoda.
I have been involved in local communities/GDGs and
actually I'm Google Developer Expert in Android

2.name: Taylor Ling
2.title: Designer
2.shortBio: I am a professional Mobile Product Designer and passionate about good mobile UI/UX....
2.bio:
I am a professional Mobile Product Designer and passionate about good mobile UI/UX.
Previously I worked in a 3D printing company on their life-saving medical software.
Today, I works at Snappymob, a startup in Kuala Lumpur making a difference in the local mobile app development scene by creating high quality apps that users love.
I also involved heavily in designing Fabulous, a habit-forming app that got into Google Play Store Editor's Choice and nominated in Google Play Award.

3.name: Poe Poe Myint Swe
3.title: Software Engineer
3.shortBio: I am a software engineer at 99.co, together with the product team...
3.bio:
I am a software engineer at 99.co, together with the product team.
I mainly work on shipping features of Android app. Also a member of MMAUG and
contributes to android projects like Myanmar Flood Info.

4.name: Su Mon Kywe
4.title: Research Scientist
4.shortBio: Su Mon Kywe is a research scientist at Appthority, a mobile security start-up in San Francisco....
4.bio: Su Mon Kywe is a research scientist at Appthority, a mobile security start-up in San Francisco. She obtained her Ph.D. and B.Sc. degrees from Singapore Management University (SMU). She was also an exchange scholar at Carnegie Mellon University (CMU). She did her internships in Samsung Research America, SAS Institute and IBM Singapore. Su Mon Kywe is known for her contributions to Apple’s iOS and Google’s Android security.

5.title: Chief Trainier
5.shortBio: I am Web and Android Trainer at Myanmar Links...
5.bio: I am Web and Android Trainer at Myanmar Links. I am also a web developer and an Android developer too.

6.name: Maung Maung Thant
6.title: Cloud & Drupal Solutions Architect/Trainer
6.shortBio: A Solution Architect, Trainer, Contributor & Learner in Drupal, Cloud, Web Performance Optimization and Security...
6.bio: A Solution Architect, Trainer, Contributor & Learner in Drupal, Cloud, Web Performance Optimization and Security. A volunteer and Love to help people to make their lives easier. Feel free to contact me on Facebook or connect with me on Linkedin to view all my Volunteer works and projects for clients. See you at GDG DevFest Yangon 2016. <3 <3 <3

7.name: Aung Pyae Phyo
7.title: Product Manager
7.shortBio: End-to-end mobile solution developer based in Myanmar and Singapore...
7.bio: End-to-end mobile solution developer based in Myanmar and Singapore. Passionate on architecting the design-intensive solution to provide both usability and the delightful experience to the user. Focus on complete understanding of the market trajectory and user behaviors for the solution.

8.name: Tin Aung Lin
8.title: Research Engineer
8.shortBio: I am a research engineer at Frontiir. I usually spend my time hacking on system level engineering plus...
8.bio: I am a research engineer at Frontiir. I usually spend my time hacking on system level engineering plus ops related reporting, troubleshooting and monitoring. Research on the new systems and software to solve our very own specific problems in ISP market. And propose reliable systems to implement and test on production.

9.name: Ko Ko Ye
9.title: Team Leader
9.shortBio: I have played around with Linux since 2004...
9.bio: I am a leader of the Ubuntu Myanmar LoCo Team and founder of the FOSS Myanmar. I acted as a technical support team leader of the biggest Barcamp of the world (Barcamp Yangon 2013) with our LoCo team members and also act as an Assistant Coordinator from 2013 to now. I Love Ubuntu and open sources such as OSS, FLOSS, GNU, GPL, MIT, Apache and so on.

10.name: Ye Linn Wai
10.title: Technology Community Liaison
10.shortBio: Ye Linn Wai @ Moe Lone is passionate about Technology to change the country...
10.bio: Ye Linn Wai @ Moe Lone Pyae Shan is passionate about Technology to change the country. He jumped into IT circles since 15 years old. He started writing tech articles for well-known internet journal and lead the Myanmar IT Village website since he was in high school. He wrote two best-seller android books targeted for non-technical readers. He is the founder of Computer Science Club at University of Computer Studies, Yangon. He organized first ever Student Showcase at the University. Currently, he is a technology community liaison at Phandeeyar.  On top of that he’s the Community Manager for the GDG Yangon.

12.name: Ei Maung
12.title: Managing Partner
12.shortBio: Web developer with 10 years experiences and currently leading web and mobile app service...
12.bio: Web developer with 10 years experiences and currently leading web and mobile app service agency called Fairway Technology as the managing partner. Also a principal of Fairway Co-founder school. Author of Professional Web Developer, Ubuntu - Linux for You and Rockstar Developer. Frequent speakers at tech events.

13.name: Kyaw Zaw Win
13.title: Senior Consultant
13.shortBio: I have been working as software engineer, full stack and consultant for large scale products and...
13.bio: I have been working as software engineer, full stack and consultant for large scale products and platform for over 9 years in which 7+ years in Singapore and counting. I am always motivated to find ways to build cost effectively maintainable software solution regardless of the size.

14.name: Phu Mon Htut
14.title: Research Engineer
14.shortBio: I'm a research engineer at Institute of High Performance Computing in Singapore...
14.bio: I'm a research engineer at Institute of High Performance Computing in Singapore. I'm fascinated by Artificial Intelligence field and have strong passion for Machine Learning, Deep Neural Networks. Currently, I'm working on research and development of Machine Learning, Deep Neural Networks and their applications in Natural Language Processing.

15.name: Dr. Tun Thura Thet
15.title: CEO
15.shortBio: Tun is the founder and CEO of Myanmar Information Technology Pte Ltd (MIT), the leading enterprise software development...
15.bio: Tun is the founder and CEO of Myanmar Information Technology Pte Ltd (MIT), the leading enterprise software development and System Integration Company in Myanmar. Tun is also the director and co-founder of Myanmar ICT Development Corporation, and the Joint Secretary of Myanmar Computer Federation (MCF), the federation of computer industrial and professional associations, as well as the chairman of the Myanmar Software Industry Development Committee (SIDC).

17.name: Soonson Kwon
17.title: Head of APAC Ecosystem, Developer Relations
17.shortBio: I am manager of DevRel APAC Ecosystem and Korea Regional Lead both working on building...
17.bio: I am manager of DevRel APAC Ecosystem and Korea Regional Lead both working on building strong ecosystem for developers. 20 years ago at 1996, I founded KLDP, Korea's largest/oldest open source community as well.

16.bio: A mobile engineer. Strong on native iOS and Android development. Currently working for Samsung product apps with native android development.
